typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		row_id as string,
		id as string,
		internal_id as string,
		first_name as string,
		middle_name as string,
		last_name as string,
		email as string,
		image as string,
		status as string,
		notify_user as boolean,
		role as string,
		last_access as string,
		client_id as string,
		created_at as string,
		modified_at as string,
		entity_source as string,
		insert_date as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Staging
source(output(
		id as string,
		internal_id as string,
		first_name as string,
		middle_name as string,
		last_name as string,
		email as string,
		image as string,
		status as string,
		notify_user as boolean,
		role as string,
		last_access as string,
		client_id as string,
		created_at as string,
		modified_at as string,
		entity_source as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Existing
SortByInsertedDate, ExistingIds lookup(id == existing_id,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'first',
	asc(existing_id, true),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupExistingIds
Existing select(mapColumn(
		existing_id = id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ExistingIds
LookupExistingIds alterRow(insertIf(isNull(existing_id)),
	updateIf(!isNull(existing_id))) ~> DecideMerge
Staging sort(asc(insert_date, true)) ~> SortByInsertedDate
DecideMerge sink(input(
		id as string,
		internal_id as string,
		first_name as string,
		middle_name as string,
		last_name as string,
		email as string,
		image as string,
		status as string,
		notify_user as boolean,
		role as string,
		last_access as string,
		client_id as string,
		created_at as string,
		modified_at as string,
		entity_source as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['id'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		id,
		internal_id,
		first_name,
		middle_name,
		last_name,
		email,
		image,
		status,
		notify_user,
		role,
		last_access,
		client_id,
		created_at,
		modified_at,
		entity_source
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Merge
